Class StaffHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.StaffHomePage
public class StaffHomePage extends Object
This page displays the staff interface for viewing questions, answers, reviews, and feedback. Staff members can view all information but cannot add or modify content.

      Parameters:
      reviewList - The list of reviews to display
      reviewType - The type of reviews (question or answer)
